ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 51
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Looking at the spell Flare using the Spell program I wrote, I noticed that it no longer has a target type.  So you can t target the spell.  My guess is
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Jordan <jordanis@...>
>Also, anyone else notice that FLARE no longer works?

Looking at the spell Flare using the Spell program I wrote, I noticed that
it no longer has a target type. So you can't target the spell. My guess
is that Verant just screwed it up. I will email them about it, if we want
to get their attention, we could all do it. It looks to me like it would
be a VERY easy fix, assuming the server doesn't have to be modified as
well. It is a single byte in the file that needs to be changed.

chpicker
Minister of Commerce, OCD
Veeshan
